00026 //---------------------------------------------------------
00027 //   UndoOp
00028 //    spicifies a single low level undo operation
00029 //---------------------------------------------------------
00030 
00031 struct UndoOp {
00032       enum UndoType {
00033             RemoveObject, AddObject,
00034             InsertPart, RemovePart,
00035             InsertStaff, RemoveStaff,
00036             InsertSegStaff, RemoveSegStaff,
00037             InsertMStaff, RemoveMStaff,
00038             InsertMeasure, RemoveMeasure,
00039             SortStaves
00040             };
00041       UndoType type;
00042       Element* obj;
00043       Part* part;
00044       Staff* staff;
00045       MStaff mstaff;
00046       System* system;
00047       Measure* measure;
00048       Segment* segment;
00049       std::list<int> si;
00050       std::list<int> di;
00051 
00052       int idx;
00053       const char* name() const;
00054       };
00055 
00056 //---------------------------------------------------------
00057 //   Undo
00058 //    single unser visible undo
00059 //---------------------------------------------------------
00060 
00061 struct Undo : public std::list<UndoOp> {
00062       InputState inputState;
00063       Selection selection;
00064 
00065    public:
00066       Undo(const InputState&, const Selection&);
00067       ~Undo();
00068       };
00069 
00070 typedef Undo::iterator iUndoOp;
00071 typedef Undo::reverse_iterator riUndoOp;
